title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Slovakia 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of arrivals in millions is roughly constant from 2009 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 4.27 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Number of arrivals in millions about 3.34 was reached at Year 2009
